pkgmetadata.longdescription: Isolation-Forest Based 'CNV' Detection from 'NGS' Data // Automatically detects Copy Number Variations (CNV) from Next Generation Sequencing data using a machine learning algorithm, Isolation forest. More details about the method can be found in the paper by Cabello-Aguilar (2022) doi:10.1101/2022.01.03.474771.
